categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: Perimeter Outpost Delta, also known simply as Outpost Delta, was an outpost located on the planet Hoth. It was far to the northwest of Echo Base and a hundred meters outside the base's energy shield, consisting of a three-person laser turret, a hand-dug trench and a handful of light artillery emplacements. It was notably used by the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Battle of Hoth.
